title: 1. The Dark Knight
summary: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

title: 2. Inception
summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: 10. The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: 11. Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: 12. Batman Begins
summary: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: 13. Joker
summary: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of chaos in Gotham City.

title: 14. Shutter Island
summary: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

title: 15. The Prestige
summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.

title: 16. The Avengers
summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: 17. The Departed
summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: 18. Avatar
summary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: 19. Memento
summary: A former insurance investigator who now suffers from anterograde amnesia uses notes and tattoos to hunt down his wife's murderer.

title: 20. Avengers: Endgame
summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 21. Guardians of the Galaxy
summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: 22. Avengers: Infinity War
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: 23. Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: 24. WALL路E
summary: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 25. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary: After waking from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: 1. The Dark Knight
summary: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

title: 2. Inception
summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: 3. Interstellar
summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: 4. The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: 5. The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: 6. The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

title: 7. The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: 8. Django Unchained
summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

title: 9. Gladiator
summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
